SELECT HGDB.ID, HGDT.NAME, HGDB.AGE, HGDB.SEX, HGDT.DESCRIPTION, HGDB.POSITION_ID, HOPT.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, HGDB.BIRTH, HGDB.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER FROM HAP_GRID_DEMO_B HGDB LEFT OUTER JOIN HAP_GRID_DEMO_TL HGDT ON ( HGDB.ID = HGDT.ID AND HGDT.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} ) LEFT JOIN HR_ORG_POSITION_TL HOPT ON ( HOPT.POSITION_ID = HGDB.POSITION_ID AND HOPT.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} )
AND HGDB.ID = #id
AND HGDT.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND HGDT.DESCRIPTION LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY ${__sort_column} ${__order_flag}
